task.title: How to download a FieldWorks application

prerequisites.p: Before you can dowload an application to test, you will need to:

ul.li: Realize, the download of about 100 MB will likely take much longer than the theoretical half an hour using a 56K modem with no competing traffic.

steps.p: Here are the steps to download an appliction from the SIL Intranet:
steps.step:
Locate or create a directory to recieve the software download.
If the download is a "zip" file or installation folder, a temporary folder can be used. Otherwise, provide a more permanent location such as in a subfolder of the "Program Files" system folder.
Start your browser and enter this universal resource locator (url), http://intranet.sil.org/softwaredev/ in its address box then press the <Enter> key or click
Beside "Current Project's Home Pages", click the link of the project producing the software.
Locate the download page or link.
A dialog asks whether to run from the website or copy to your disk. Click "copy to disk".
Another dialog askes you to choose a folder on your system to put the file in. Choose the folder you selected in step 1.
